= Andrico 2.0 Screenshots =

Now, new version of Andrico is available.

You can see new features via extremly pretty screens:

The main window was unchanged, and after success authorization you will see the *Synchronization* window with 3 buttons available (if you haven't synchronized before of course):
http://andrico.googlecode.com/svn/screenshots/2.0/01_synchronize.jpg

There is new option in *Settins* window. Now you can choose new option - *Synchronize Pictures* weather you want to download all icons of your friens and events or not:
http://andrico.googlecode.com/svn/screenshots/2.0/02_settings.jpg
